verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, You shall be <S%H6918>holy:<s%> for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>
You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H6437>Turn<s%> you not to <S%H457>idols,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> to yourselves <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> it at your own <S%H7522>will.<s%>

It shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H2077>offer<s%> it, and on the <S%H4283>morrow:<s%> and if ought <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> it be <S%H398>eaten<s%> at all on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it is <S%H6292>abominable;<s%> it shall not be <S%H7521>accepted.<s%>

Therefore every one that <S%H398>eats<s%> it shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> thing of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from among his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And when you <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not <S%H3615>wholly<s%> reap the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7704>field,<s%> neither shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleanings<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

And you shall not <S%H5953>glean<s%> your <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H3950>gather<s%> every <S%H6528>grape<s%> of your <S%H3754>vineyard;<s%> you shall <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H1616>stranger:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall not <S%H1589>steal,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> deal <S%H3584>falsely,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8266>lie<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H5997>another.<s%>
And you shall not <S%H7650>swear<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8267>falsely,<s%> neither shall you <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

You shall not <S%H6231>defraud<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1497>rob<s%> him: the <S%H6468>wages<s%> of him that is <S%H7916>hired<s%> shall not <S%H3885>abide<s%> with you all night <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

You shall not <S%H7043>curse<s%> the <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> a stumbling <S%H4383>block<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5787>blind,<s%> but shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> you shall not <S%H5375>respect<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1921>honor<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H1419>mighty:<s%> but in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall you <S%H8199>judge<s%> your <S%H5997>neighbor.<s%>

You shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> up and down as a <S%H7400>talebearer<s%> among your <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

You shall not <S%H8130>hate<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart:<s%> you shall in any <S%H3198>wise<s%> <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> your <S%H5997>neighbor,<s%> and not <S%H5375>suffer<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> on him.

You shall not <S%H5358>avenge,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5201>bear<s%> any <S%H5201>grudge<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> but you shall <S%H157>love<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> as yourself: I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes.<s%> You shall not let your <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H7250>engender<s%> with a <S%H3610>diverse<s%> kind: you shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H7704>field<s%> with <S%H3610>mingled<s%> seed: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall a <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H3610>mingled<s%> of <S%H8162>linen<s%> and <S%H8162>woolen<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> on you.

And <S%H376>whoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7902>carnally<s%> <S%H2233><s%> with a <S%H802>woman,<s%> that is a female <S%H8198>slave,<s%> <S%H2778>betrothed<s%> to an <S%H376>husband,<s%> and not at all <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2668>freedom<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> her; she shall be <S%H1244>scourged;<s%> they shall not be put to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she was not <S%H2666>free.<s%>

And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> even a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him with the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H817>trespass<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has done: and the <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he has done shall be <S%H5545>forgiven<s%> him.

And <S%H3588>when<s%> you shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall have <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> then you shall count the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof as <S%H6189>uncircumcised:<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> shall it be as <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> to you: it shall not be <S%H398>eaten<s%> of.
But in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H1974>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with.

And in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof, that it may <S%H3254>yield<s%> to you the <S%H8393>increase<s%> thereof: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> any thing with the <S%H1818>blood:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H5172>use<s%> <S%H5172>enchantment,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6049>observe<s%> times.
You shall not <S%H5362>round<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

You shall not <S%H5414>make<s%> any <S%H8296>cuttings<s%> in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for the <S%H5315>dead,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>print<s%> any <S%H7085>marks<s%> on you: I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Do not <S%H2490>prostitute<s%> your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> to cause her to be a <S%H2181>whore;<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> fall to <S%H2181>prostitution,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4390>become<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2154>wickedness.<s%>
You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H3372>reverence<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H6437>Regard<s%> not them that have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> to be <S%H2930>defiled<s%> by them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7872>hoary<s%> head, and <S%H1921>honor<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H2205>old<s%> man, and <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H3588>if<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> with you in your <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall not <S%H3238>vex<s%> him.

But the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>dwells<s%> with you shall be to you as one <S%H249>born<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> you, and you shall <S%H157>love<s%> him as yourself; for you were <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteousness<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> in <S%H4060>length,<s%> in <S%H4948>weight,<s%> or in <S%H4884>measure.<s%>

<S%H6664>Just<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H68>weights,<s%> a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1969>hin,<s%> shall you <S%H1961>have:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
Therefore shall you <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
